thread.title: Couppon: $10 off at Lowe's Home Improvement
thread.title_full: Couppon: $10 off at Lowe's Home Improvement - Sun Sentinel

author: Doreen Christensen
title: Couppon: $10 off at Lowe's Home Improvement
text:
Get a $10 off coupon good at Lowe's Home Improvement when you sign up for emails.
The coupon is good in stores or online for savings on a $50 purchase. At the link below, scroll all the way to the bottom right of the page and click "Save $10 when you join email alerts" box to sign up.
I got my coupon in minutes.
Note: The off also is accepted at Home Depot as a competitor coupon.
Click here for the deal.
Like Doreen's Deals on Facebook ; follow Doreen Christensen on Twitter@PrettyGoodIdeas and sign up for Deals text alerts .
Free $10 gift card, $70 in coupon savings at Publix Doreen Christensen If you're shopping for Passover or Easter feasts, Publix is offering $70 in coupon savings for spring. Plus, you can use a Target coupon to get a free $10 gift card, too.
There are 50 coupons good for free eggs, savings on baking needs, frozen foods, personal care items and more.
If Target is accepted...
